subject: Re: Question
msgSnippet: Did you ever get this sorted? I ve got the same problem using the Quartz scheduler. Pete ... at ...
messageBody:
Did you ever get this sorted?

I've got the same problem using the Quartz scheduler.

Pete

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "hate12_sj" <hate12sj@h...> wrote:

>
> If so, maybe you could help me out.
>

at
